data.eml:eml: Study of the genus Bracon Fabricius, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of Southern Iran with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ameri, Ali, Talebi, Ali Asghar, Beyarslan, Ahmet, Kamali, Karim, Rakhshani, Ehsan (2013): Study of the genus Bracon Fabricius, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of Southern Iran with description of a new species. Zootaxa 3754 (4): 353-380, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.4.2
